name: SFT HODLERS FUNDRAISER ALERT
description: Makerverse is currently raising funding for our first product: Cube Spawn Maker. 20 Time Crystal Shards, left by The Maker himself, are currently available to SFT Holders ONLY for $500 each. These shards entitle holders to a copy of 1% of all new tokenised puzzles and solutions created by the Cube Spawn Maker community, providing a constant passive stream of tokens into your wallet which will grow in value, number and in proportion to the size of the Cube Spawn Maker community and the value and complexity of the solutions created. After these first twenty shards are bought, the price will immediately increase to $700 and then keep increasing as each one is sold. Time Crystal Shards will be backed with 100ENJ with zero transfer fees. Contact @PatrickMockridge on Telegram with your wallet address to reserve yours.
